titleStmt.title: A counter-snarle for Ishmael Rabshacheh, a Cecropidan Lycaonite. By Sr. Edward Hoby, Knight, one of the gentlemen of his Maiesties Priuie-Chamber
titleStmt.author: Hoby, Edward, Sir, 1560-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld and Thomas Snodham] for Nath. Butter, by the authoritie of superiours,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Floyd, John. The overthrow of the Protestants pulpit-Babels.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
